sentences.en: Curved glass was the popular contrivance for producing not truth but illusion, untruth.
sentences.cn: 曲面镜不是用来产生真实影像,而是用来产生幻影(即假象)的流行器件.

sentences.en: I have never uttered one word of untruth.

sentences.cn: 另一方面, 慌言这种东西肯定是存在的.

sentences.en: She wasn't very convinced about the nice distinction between a lie and the untruth.
sentences.cn: 对于谎言和不诚实之间的细微差别,她还不十分确信.

sentences.en: That is why I disguise them in untruth, saying the contrary of what I mean.

sentences.en: That is why I disguise them untruth, saying the contrary of what I mean.

sentences.en: The untruth has been brought home to him.

sentences.en: There was truth and there was untruth.
